lexUnit.name: demolish.v

document.description: Examples of the lemma demolish from the MASC project for FN annotation
document.name: demolish

lexUnit.definition: FN: wine a game by a large margin

sentence.text: Arantxa Sanchez-Vicario positively demolished her opponents with a ruthlessness reminiscent of Navratilova 's great rival of the 1980's , Chris Evert .
